thread.title: Fiesta Bowl, Ohio State vs. Clemson score: Live blog, highlights, semifinal updates
thread.title_full: Fiesta Bowl, Ohio State vs. Clemson score: Live blog, highlights, semifinal updates

author: Chip Patterson
title: Fiesta Bowl, Ohio State vs. Clemson score: Live blog, highlights, semifinal updates
text:
11m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
The 2016 College Football Playoff continues Saturday night with ACC champion No. 2 Clemson as a slight underdog to No. 3 Ohio State , which enters as the first playoff team to neither win its division nor its conference in the regular season. 
While the Tigers have the opportunity to return to the CFP National Championship for the second straight season against No. 1 Alabama (which won the Peach Bowl earlier), the Buckeyes are looking to avenge a loss to Clemson in the 2014 Orange Bowl and play for the national title for the second time in three years. 
Will it be Dabo Swinney and Deshaun Watson continuing their incredible partnership, or Urban Meyer adding to his tremendous postseason record with J.T. Barrett looking for a ring he can truly call his own? 
It all goes down starting at 7 p.m. ET live from Glendale, Arizona. CBS Sports will be with you the entire way with live scores, updates and the game's best highlights. If the live blog below does not load for you, please click here to view it. 
Thanks for stopping by.
